title: Project Babbage: Ada Makes Movies
description: Film production is ripe for digital disruption.  Opportunity to make the lives of creators and investors easier through smart contracts.

f6_assessments.q0: The use of blockchain in compensating movie script writter is unique but does not sound convincing as a viable application. How and who will evaluate the story for payment. The proposal claims to pay "few" writers 30 K USD for movie script on ADA. ? This does not require dApp unless there is a plan to place a full-fledged governing system. However, the development and funding of governing system are not included in the proposal. Overall the deliverables are not apparent in the proposal.
f6_assessments.q1: The proposer claims 16 years of product management and 10 years of independent film production experience. Any reference to his past work would have enabled a better assessment of his experience to successfully execute this proposal.
f6_assessments.q2: The cost for proposal does not have clear ratioons. The number of writers to be engaged and the amount of compensation for each are not clear and most importantly who and how the movie will be financed is a major question. With these unknown, it is difficult to audit the progress and estimate the chance of success of the proposal.

solution: A dapp ecosystem for movie production:  a production company in a crypto box.  Predictable for investors and safe for creators.
experience: Traveled By / Analytical Engine Productions includes 16 years of product management and 10 years of independent film production experience.
